00160 static const char * stores [NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS] = { "LIB", "APP", "TOK" };
00161 
00162 typedef struct netsnmp_ds_read_config_s {
00163   u_char          type;
00164   char           *token;
00165   char           *ftype;
00166   int             storeid;
00167   int             which;
00168   struct netsnmp_ds_read_config_s *next;
00169 } netsnmp_ds_read_config;
00170 
00171 static netsnmp_ds_read_config *netsnmp_ds_configs = NULL;
00172 
00173 static int   netsnmp_ds_integers[NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS][NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS];
00174 static char  netsnmp_ds_booleans[NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS][NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS/8];
00175 static char *netsnmp_ds_strings[NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS][NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS];
00176 static void *netsnmp_ds_voids[NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS][NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS];
00177

00179  * Prototype definitions

00196 int
00197 netsnmp_ds_set_boolean(int storeid, int which, int value)
00198 {
00199     if (storeid < 0 || storeid >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS || 
00200         which   < 0 || which   >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS) {
00201         return SNMPERR_GENERR;
00202     }
00203 
00204     DEBUGMSGTL(("netsnmp_ds_set_boolean", "Setting %s:%d = %d/%s\n",
00205                 stores[storeid], which, value, ((value) ? "True" : "False")));
00206 
00207     if (value > 0) {
00208         netsnmp_ds_booleans[storeid][which/8] |= (1 << (which % 8));
00209     } else {
00210         netsnmp_ds_booleans[storeid][which/8] &= (0xff7f >> (7 - (which % 8)));
00211     }
00212 
00213     return SNMPERR_SUCCESS;
00214 }
00215 
00216 int
00217 netsnmp_ds_toggle_boolean(int storeid, int which)
00218 {
00219     if (storeid < 0 || storeid >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS || 
00220         which   < 0 || which   >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS) {
00221         return SNMPERR_GENERR;
00222     }
00223 
00224     if ((netsnmp_ds_booleans[storeid][which/8] & (1 << (which % 8))) == 0) {
00225         netsnmp_ds_booleans[storeid][which/8] |= (1 << (which % 8));
00226     } else {
00227         netsnmp_ds_booleans[storeid][which/8] &= (0xff7f >> (7 - (which % 8)));
00228     }
00229 
00230     DEBUGMSGTL(("netsnmp_ds_toggle_boolean", "Setting %s:%d = %d/%s\n",
00231                 stores[storeid], which, netsnmp_ds_booleans[storeid][which/8],
00232                 ((netsnmp_ds_booleans[storeid][which/8]) ? "True" : "False")));
00233 
00234     return SNMPERR_SUCCESS;
00235 }
00236 
00237 int
00238 netsnmp_ds_get_boolean(int storeid, int which)
00239 {
00240     if (storeid < 0 || storeid >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS || 
00241         which   < 0 || which   >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS) {
00242         return SNMPERR_GENERR;
00243     }
00244 
00245     return (netsnmp_ds_booleans[storeid][which/8] & (1 << (which % 8))) ? 1:0;
00246 }
00247 
00248 int
00249 netsnmp_ds_set_int(int storeid, int which, int value)
00250 {
00251     if (storeid < 0 || storeid >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS || 
00252         which   < 0 || which   >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS) {
00253         return SNMPERR_GENERR;
00254     }
00255 
00256     DEBUGMSGTL(("netsnmp_ds_set_int", "Setting %s:%d = %d\n",
00257                 stores[storeid], which, value));
00258 
00259     netsnmp_ds_integers[storeid][which] = value;
00260     return SNMPERR_SUCCESS;
00261 }
00262 
00263 int
00264 netsnmp_ds_get_int(int storeid, int which)
00265 {
00266     if (storeid < 0 || storeid >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS || 
00267         which   < 0 || which   >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS) {
00268         return SNMPERR_GENERR;
00269     }
00270 
00271     return netsnmp_ds_integers[storeid][which];
00272 }
00273 
00274 int
00275 netsnmp_ds_set_string(int storeid, int which, const char *value)
00276 {
00277     if (storeid < 0 || storeid >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS || 
00278         which   < 0 || which   >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS) {
00279         return SNMPERR_GENERR;
00280     }
00281 
00282     DEBUGMSGTL(("netsnmp_ds_set_string", "Setting %s:%d = \"%s\"\n",
00283                 stores[storeid], which, (value ? value : "(null)")));
00284 
00285     /*
00286      * is some silly person is calling us with our own pointer?
00287      */
00288     if (netsnmp_ds_strings[storeid][which] == value)
00289         return SNMPERR_SUCCESS;
00290     
00291     if (netsnmp_ds_strings[storeid][which] != NULL) {
00292         free(netsnmp_ds_strings[storeid][which]);
00293         netsnmp_ds_strings[storeid][which] = NULL;
00294     }
00295 
00296     if (value) {
00297         netsnmp_ds_strings[storeid][which] = strdup(value);
00298     } else {
00299         netsnmp_ds_strings[storeid][which] = NULL;
00300     }
00301 
00302     return SNMPERR_SUCCESS;
00303 }
00304 
00305 char *
00306 netsnmp_ds_get_string(int storeid, int which)
00307 {
00308     if (storeid < 0 || storeid >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS || 
00309         which   < 0 || which   >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS) {
00310         return NULL;
00311     }
00312 
00313     return netsnmp_ds_strings[storeid][which];
00314 }

00316 int
00317 netsnmp_ds_set_void(int storeid, int which, void *value)
00318 {
00319     if (storeid < 0 || storeid >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS || 
00320         which   < 0 || which   >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS) {
00321         return SNMPERR_GENERR;
00322     }
00323 
00324     DEBUGMSGTL(("netsnmp_ds_set_void", "Setting %s:%d = %x\n",
00325                 stores[storeid], which, value));
00326 
00327     netsnmp_ds_voids[storeid][which] = value;
00328 
00329     return SNMPERR_SUCCESS;
00330 }

00332 void *
00333 netsnmp_ds_get_void(int storeid, int which)
00334 {
00335     if (storeid < 0 || storeid >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS || 
00336         which   < 0 || which   >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS) {
00337         return NULL;
00338     }
00339 
00340     return netsnmp_ds_voids[storeid][which];
00341 }
00342 
00343 void
00344 netsnmp_ds_handle_config(const char *token, char *line)
00345 {
00346     netsnmp_ds_read_config *drsp;
00347     char            buf[SNMP_MAXBUF];
00348     char           *value, *endptr;
00349     int             itmp;
00350     char           *st;
00351 
00352     DEBUGMSGTL(("netsnmp_ds_handle_config", "handling %s\n", token));
00353 
00354     for (drsp = netsnmp_ds_configs;
00355          drsp != NULL && strcasecmp(token, drsp->token) != 0;
00356          drsp = drsp->next);
00357 
00358     if (drsp != NULL) {
00359         DEBUGMSGTL(("netsnmp_ds_handle_config",
00360                     "setting: token=%s, type=%d, id=%s, which=%d\n",
00361                     drsp->token, drsp->type, stores[drsp->storeid],
00362                     drsp->which));
00363 
00364         switch (drsp->type) {
00365         case ASN_BOOLEAN:
00366             value = strtok_r(line, " \t\n", &st);
00367             if (strcasecmp(value, "yes") == 0 || 
00368                 strcasecmp(value, "true") == 0) {
00369                 itmp = 1;
00370             } else if (strcasecmp(value, "no") == 0 ||
00371                        strcasecmp(value, "false") == 0) {
00372                 itmp = 0;
00373             } else {
00374                 itmp = strtol(value, &endptr, 10);
00375                 if (*endptr != 0 || itmp < 0 || itmp > 1) {
00376                     config_perror("Should be yes|no|true|false|0|1");
00377                 }
00378             }
00379             netsnmp_ds_set_boolean(drsp->storeid, drsp->which, itmp);
00380             DEBUGMSGTL(("netsnmp_ds_handle_config", "bool: %d\n", itmp));
00381             break;
00382 
00383         case ASN_INTEGER:
00384             value = strtok_r(line, " \t\n", &st);
00385             itmp = strtol(value, &endptr, 10);
00386             if (*endptr != 0) {
00387                 config_perror("Bad integer value");
00388             } else {
00389                 netsnmp_ds_set_int(drsp->storeid, drsp->which, itmp);
00390             }
00391             DEBUGMSGTL(("netsnmp_ds_handle_config", "int: %d\n", itmp));
00392             break;
00393 
00394         case ASN_OCTET_STR:
00395             if (*line == '"') {
00396                 copy_nword(line, buf, sizeof(buf));
00397                 netsnmp_ds_set_string(drsp->storeid, drsp->which, buf);
00398             } else {
00399                 netsnmp_ds_set_string(drsp->storeid, drsp->which, line);
00400             }
00401             DEBUGMSGTL(("netsnmp_ds_handle_config", "string: %s\n", line));
00402             break;
00403 
00404         default:
00405             snmp_log(LOG_ERR, "netsnmp_ds_handle_config: type %d (0x%02x)\n",
00406                      drsp->type, drsp->type);
00407             break;
00408         }
00409     } else {
00410         snmp_log(LOG_ERR, "netsnmp_ds_handle_config: no registration for %s\n",
00411                  token);
00412     }
00413 }
00414 
00415 
00416 int
00417 netsnmp_ds_register_config(u_char type, const char *ftype, const char *token,
00418                            int storeid, int which)
00419 {
00420     netsnmp_ds_read_config *drsp;
00421 
00422     if (storeid < 0 || storeid >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS    || 
00423         which   < 0 || which   >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS || token == NULL) {
00424         return SNMPERR_GENERR;
00425     }
00426 
00427     if (netsnmp_ds_configs == NULL) {
00428         netsnmp_ds_configs = SNMP_MALLOC_TYPEDEF(netsnmp_ds_read_config);
00429         drsp = netsnmp_ds_configs;
00430     } else {
00431         for (drsp = netsnmp_ds_configs; drsp->next != NULL; drsp = drsp->next);
00432         drsp->next = SNMP_MALLOC_TYPEDEF(netsnmp_ds_read_config);
00433         drsp = drsp->next;
00434     }
00435 
00436     drsp->type    = type;
00437     drsp->ftype   = strdup(ftype);
00438     drsp->token   = strdup(token);
00439     drsp->storeid = storeid;
00440     drsp->which   = which;
00441 
00442     switch (type) {
00443     case ASN_BOOLEAN:
00444         register_config_handler(ftype, token, netsnmp_ds_handle_config, NULL,
00445                                 "(1|yes|true|0|no|false)");
00446         break;
00447 
00448     case ASN_INTEGER:
00449         register_config_handler(ftype, token, netsnmp_ds_handle_config, NULL,
00450                                 "integerValue");
00451         break;
00452 
00453     case ASN_OCTET_STR:
00454         register_config_handler(ftype, token, netsnmp_ds_handle_config, NULL,
00455                                 "string");
00456         break;
00457 
00458     }
00459     return SNMPERR_SUCCESS;
00460 }
00461 
00462 int
00463 netsnmp_ds_register_premib(u_char type, const char *ftype, const char *token,
00464                            int storeid, int which)
00465 {
00466     netsnmp_ds_read_config *drsp;
00467 
00468     if (storeid < 0 || storeid >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS    || 
00469         which   < 0 || which   >= NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS || token == NULL) {
00470         return SNMPERR_GENERR;
00471     }
00472 
00473     if (netsnmp_ds_configs == NULL) {
00474         netsnmp_ds_configs = SNMP_MALLOC_TYPEDEF(netsnmp_ds_read_config);
00475         drsp = netsnmp_ds_configs;
00476     } else {
00477         for (drsp = netsnmp_ds_configs; drsp->next != NULL; drsp = drsp->next);
00478         drsp->next = SNMP_MALLOC_TYPEDEF(netsnmp_ds_read_config);
00479         drsp = drsp->next;
00480     }
00481 
00482     drsp->type    = type;
00483     drsp->ftype   = strdup(ftype);
00484     drsp->token   = strdup(token);
00485     drsp->storeid = storeid;
00486     drsp->which   = which;
00487 
00488     switch (type) {
00489     case ASN_BOOLEAN:
00490         register_prenetsnmp_mib_handler(ftype, token, netsnmp_ds_handle_config,
00491                                         NULL, "(1|yes|true|0|no|false)");
00492         break;
00493 
00494     case ASN_INTEGER:
00495         register_prenetsnmp_mib_handler(ftype, token, netsnmp_ds_handle_config,
00496                                         NULL, "integerValue");
00497         break;
00498 
00499     case ASN_OCTET_STR:
00500         register_prenetsnmp_mib_handler(ftype, token, netsnmp_ds_handle_config,
00501                                         NULL, "string");
00502         break;
00503 
00504     }
00505     return SNMPERR_SUCCESS;
00506 }
00507 
00508 void
00509 netsnmp_ds_shutdown()
00510 {
00511     netsnmp_ds_read_config *drsp;
00512     int             i, j;
00513 
00514     for (drsp = netsnmp_ds_configs; drsp; drsp = netsnmp_ds_configs) {
00515         netsnmp_ds_configs = drsp->next;
00516 
00517         unregister_config_handler(drsp->ftype, drsp->token);
00518         if (drsp->ftype != NULL) {
00519             free(drsp->ftype);
00520         }
00521         if (drsp->token != NULL) {
00522             free(drsp->token);
00523         }
00524         free(drsp);
00525     }
00526 
00527     for (i = 0; i < NETSNMP_DS_MAX_IDS; i++) {
00528         for (j = 0; j < NETSNMP_DS_MAX_SUBIDS; j++) {
00529             if (netsnmp_ds_strings[i][j] != NULL) {
00530                 free(netsnmp_ds_strings[i][j]);
00531                 netsnmp_ds_strings[i][j] = NULL;
00532             }
00533         }
00534     }
00535 }
